alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 28 at 11:35AM AKST until December 30 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring with freezing rain possible. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Storm total snowfall of 8 to 12 inches. Freezing rain with less than one tenth of an inch accumulation expected from Nenana south this evening. * WHERE...Central Interior. * WHEN...Until midnight Wednesday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for significant reductions in visibility at times. Freezing rain expected from Nenana south this evening. West winds gusting to 40 mph on Wednesday will cause blowing snow with low visibility over Elliot Highway Summits on Wednesday. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
